sentences.english: What the Rocket fears are teams of using fast attack, and the Phoenix Suns is just outstanding at it.
sentences.chinese: 火箭最怵那些打快攻的球隊，太陽則是其中的佼佼者。

sentences.english: However, Deke has trouble matching up against faster-paced teams.
sentences.chinese: 但木大叔在快攻體系下有明顯的弱點。

sentences.english: The low of fast attack also influences the overall ability of attack.
sentences.chinese: 快攻能力低下，也使中國隊進攻整體上受到影響。

sentences.english: Only stop for Engineer Rushing or just APCs against Disintegrators.
sentences.chinese: 只有在工程師快攻或用APC抵抗粉碎者的時候暫停。

sentences.english: The Canadian team is organizing a quick attack now, they are in excellent trim today.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大隊正在組織快攻，他們今天的競技狀態特別好。

sentences.english: He shot too quickly and let the Suns rediscover their up-tempo identity.
sentences.chinese: 他投籃太快了，導致太陽再次找到快攻的節奏。

sentences.english: The result is fewer points in transition and game-breaking runs for opponents.
sentences.chinese: 結果就是對手的快攻得分和致命攻擊波減少了。

sentences.english: You can also use this to defend a fastbreak.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以用這個模式化解快攻。

sentences.english: Rocket team fear a team that loves to run the; Sun team is just the one that loves to run the most.
sentences.chinese: 火箭最怵那些打快攻的球隊，太陽則是其中的佼佼者。

sentences.english: Fastbreak is the Budget express rental service featuring paperless transactions.
sentences.chinese: 快攻是預算表示租賃服務具有無紙交易。

definition: to attack/to assault/to go on the offensive/attack/assault/offense (sports)
to strike back/to beat back/to counterattack
to serve the ball/to tee off
to receive a served ball (volleyball, tennis etc)/to catch a ball thrown by sb
dominant/controlling/strong/opposite: weak, yielding 弱受/to take by storm (military)
to go smoothly/to come off/to succeed
(military) line of troops encircling an enemy position/(telephony) outside line/(basketball) outside the three-point line
